thread.title: Lorna Vaughan Drake
thread.title_full: Walsh Brothers Shoes reviewed by Lorna Vaughan Drake

author: Lorna Vaughan Drake
title: Lorna Vaughan Drake
text:
Hi
I seen this shoes in clarks and they didn't have my size so I came across Walsh brothers shoes and noticed they had them and they did them in half sizes . I was delighted as I am between 4 and a 5 . I ordered them Thursday night and had them Monday morning . They fitted perfect . Thank you so much I would definite recommend them and will use them again
